import { __DEV__ } from '../utils/constants'
import { NonEmptyArray, Nullable, ObjectOf, ValuesOf } from '../utils/generics'
import { defaultApiQuery, ApiQuery } from './ApiQuery'
import { AnyResource, ResourceType } from './Resource'
import { ResourceFieldNames } from './ResourceField'

export type AnyResourceFilter = ResourceFilter<AnyResource, any>

export type AnyResourceFilterOptions = {
  [key: string]: NonEmptyArray<string>
}

export type ResourceFilterOptions<M extends AnyResource> =
  | ShallowResourceFilterOptions<M>
  | ResourceFragmentFieldsB<M, M['type']>

export class ResourceFilter<
  R extends AnyResource,
  F extends ResourceFilterOptions<R>
> {
  type: Nullable<R['type']>
  fields: F
  query: ApiQuery<R>

  constructor(type: Nullable<R['type']>, fields: F, query: ApiQuery<R>) {
    this.type = type
    this.fields = fields
    this.query = query
    if (__DEV__) {
      Object.freeze(this)
    }
  }
}

export const defaultResourceFilter = new ResourceFilter(
  null,
  {},
  defaultApiQuery,
)

type ShallowResourceFilterOptions<R extends AnyResource> = ObjectOf<
  R['type'],
  NonEmptyArray<ResourceFieldNames<R>>
>

type ResourceFieldOptionsExcept<
  R,
  T extends ResourceType
> = R extends AnyResource
  ? R['type'] extends T
    ? never
    : ShallowResourceFilterOptions<R>
  : never

type ResourceRelationshipsExcept<M, T extends ResourceType> = ValuesOf<
  {
    [K in keyof M]: M[K] extends Array<AnyResource>
      ? ResourceFieldOptionsExcept<M[K][number], T>
      : ResourceFieldOptionsExcept<Extract<M[K], AnyResource>, T>
  }
>

type ResourceFragmentFieldsB<M, T extends ResourceType> = M extends AnyResource
  ?
      | ResourceRelationshipsExcept<M, M['type']>
      | ValuesOf<
          { [K in keyof M]: ResourceFragmentFieldsC<M[K], T | M['type']> }
        >
  : never

type ResourceFragmentFieldsC<M, T extends ResourceType> = M extends AnyResource
  ?
      | ResourceRelationshipsExcept<M, M['type']>
      | ValuesOf<
          { [K in keyof M]: ResourceFragmentFieldsD<M[K], T | M['type']> }
        >
  : never

type ResourceFragmentFieldsD<M, T extends ResourceType> = M extends AnyResource
  ?
      | ResourceRelationshipsExcept<M, T | M['type']>
      | ValuesOf<
          { [K in keyof M]: ResourceFragmentFieldsE<M[K], T | M['type']> }
        >
  : never

type ResourceFragmentFieldsE<R, T extends ResourceType> = R extends AnyResource
  ?
      | ResourceRelationshipsExcept<R, T | R['type']>
      | ValuesOf<
          { [K in keyof R]: ResourceFragmentFieldsLimit<R[K], T | R['type']> }
        >
  : never

type ResourceFragmentFieldsLimit<R, T extends ResourceType> = never
